attributes.action: use unused north sea oil rigs as maximum security prisons, for child molestors, rapists, serial murderers and organised crime syndicate members, this would seperate hardened criminals from first time offenders and give first time offenders a chance to be rehabilitated instead institutionalised within the prison system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I don't see the sense of putting an 18 year old lad who has been caught joy riding in the same prison as hardened villians murderers and someone who serial rapes children and women, surely this can only lead to said first offender becoming embroiled in more criminal activity, by being exposed to more crime inside prison than he would be outside.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
